fonseka mahathage karyalaye kuliya gewimata mudal da, wahanayak da illa ohuge paudgalika sahakara wishramika karnal kapila rathnayaka wisin ewana lada bawa kiyana es.em.es paniwida athulath kara mudranaya kala pathrikada, handa pata kihipayakda mehidi madhya aayathana wetha labadimata ema sangamaya katayuthu karana ladi.esema awantgad samagamata chodana karana wathman rajitha senarathna amathyawaraya da ohuge pirisakata rakiya labadimata katayuthu karannayi illa ewana lada lipida samagama sathuwa athayi hethema pawasiya.madhya hamuwa amathu awantgad samagame meheyum kalamanakaru nilupul da kostha kiya sitiye awantgad samagama sambandhayen anura kumara disanayaka da wiwidha prakasha kara athi bawayi.ehi karunu hari hati dana katha kirima sudusu bawath, ee nisa awantgad samagamen siduwanne kumakdayi dana ganimata anura disanayaka mahathata haki nam karyalayata paminena lesath, eemata nohaki nam niyojithayeku ho ewana lesath ee illa sitiyeya.madhya amatha katha kala awantgad samagame wanija kalamanakaru nilantha jayawira pawasuwe ranawirunge margayen idiriyata pamini kenek awantgad hi sewaya karana ranawiruwanta apahasa kara athi bawayi.ohugema wachanawalin kiwahoth awantgad samagame wada karanne siyayata 50k kalawaddo bawath, ese wuwada api kalawaddan nowa hamudawe wishramikayin bawath, hethema ehidi kiya sitiyeya.awantgad samagama magin wishramika hamuda sebalunta wishrama jiwithaya yahapath lesa gatha kirimata awashya shakthiya labademin watupak laba ganimata haki wathawaranaya sakasu bawada ese thibiyadi mema samagamen wu sewaya agayanawata wada eya winasha karana thanata pirisak katayuthu kala bawada penwadunneya.awantgad samagama sambandhayen madhyayawala palawu wartha sathya nathi bawath, ema samagame katayuthuwala aththa naththa soya nobala katayuthu kirimen asarana wi aththe rakiya ahimi wu apa yayi da hethema pawasiya.ema samagama thula thawaduratath sewakayin hathalis gananak ho rakiya karanu athayi wishwasa nokarana bawath, rakiya ahimi wuwan sambandhayen janapathige ha agamathige awadhanaya yomuwanu athayi apeksha karana bawath, mehidi prakasha wiya.warshika suhada hamuwata ekwu pirisa anathuruwa ehi di nihandu wirodhathawayaka da niratha wiya.
